availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Absalom J. Ashby (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Ashby. Married to Sarah F. Brown Ashby in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1857. Father of Columbus P. Ashby. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 154A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 628.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 1.
"Absalom J. Ashby (1830-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #96108304, accessed November 24, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/96108304.
